# Base UI

## Overview

- [About BaseÂ UI](./react/overview/about.md): An open-source React component library for building accessible user interfaces.
- [Accessibility](./react/overview/accessibility.md): Learn how to make the most of Base UI's accessibility features and guidelines.
- [Quick start](./react/overview/quick-start.md): A quick guide to getting started with Base UI.
- [Releases](./react/overview/releases.md): Changelogs for each Base UI release.

## Handbook

- [Composition](./react/handbook/composition.md): A guide to composing Base UI components with your own React components.
- [Animation](./react/handbook/animation.md): A guide to animating Base UI components.
- [Styling](./react/handbook/styling.md): A guide to styling Base UI components with your preferred styling engine.

## Components

- [Accordion](./react/components/accordion.md): A set of collapsible panels with headings.
- [Alert Dialog](./react/components/alert-dialog.md): A dialog that requires user response to proceed.
- [Avatar](./react/components/avatar.md): An easily stylable avatar component.
- [Checkbox Group](./react/components/checkbox-group.md): Provides shared state to a series of checkboxes.
- [Checkbox](./react/components/checkbox.md): An easily stylable checkbox component.
- [Collapsible](./react/components/collapsible.md): A collapsible panel controlled by a button.
- [Dialog](./react/components/dialog.md): A popup that opens on top of the entire page.
- [Field](./react/components/field.md): A component that provides labelling and validation for form controls.
- [Fieldset](./react/components/fieldset.md): A native fieldset element with an easily stylable legend.
- [Form](./react/components/form.md): A native form element with consolidated error handling.
- [Input](./react/components/input.md): A native input element that automatically works with Field.
- [Menu](./react/components/menu.md): A list of actions in a dropdown, enhanced with keyboard navigation.
- [Meter](./react/components/meter.md): A graphical display of a numeric value within a range.
- [Number Field](./react/components/number-field.md): A numeric input element with increment and decrement buttons, and a scrub area.
- [Popover](./react/components/popover.md): An accessible popup anchored to a button.
- [Preview Card](./react/components/preview-card.md): A popup that appears when a link is hovered, showing a preview for sighted users.
- [Progress](./react/components/progress.md): Displays the status of a task that takes a long time.
- [Radio](./react/components/radio.md): An easily stylable radio button component.
- [Scroll Area](./react/components/scroll-area.md): A native scroll container with custom scrollbars.
- [Select](./react/components/select.md): A common form component for choosing a predefined value in a dropdown menu.
- [Separator](./react/components/separator.md): A separator element accessible to screen readers.
- [Slider](./react/components/slider.md): An easily stylable range input.
- [Switch](./react/components/switch.md): A control that indicates whether a setting is on or off.
- [Tabs](./react/components/tabs.md): A component for toggling between related panels on the same page.
- [Toggle](./react/components/toggle.md): A two-state button that can be on or off.
- [Toggle Group](./react/components/toggle-group.md): Provides a shared state to a series of toggle buttons.
- [Toolbar](./react/components/toolbar.md): A container for grouping a set of buttons and controls.
- [Tooltip](./react/components/tooltip.md): A popup that appears when an element is hovered or focused, showing a hint for sighted users.
- [Toast](./react/components/toast.md): Generates toast notifications.

## Utilities

- [Direction Provider](./react/utils/direction-provider.md): Enables RTL behavior for Base UI components.
- [useRender](./react/utils/use-render.md): Hook for enabling a render prop in custom components.
